data.name: Cubox - Awakening of gods
data.detailed_description:
If you have ideas :) Our community discord server: https://discord.gg/gQvwDtW
Gather resources from an endless world on your own or team up with others to form guilds. Use your supplies to create anything from small huts to impenetrable fortresses, shaping the world around you.

Master the art of skill-based ranged combat to gain an advantage over even the strongest of foes. Use your ability to fend off attacks from a distance as you traverse the terrain, or rain arrows upon enemies from the walls of your keep.

Obtain the destructive power of magic by wielding rods and anilalate both the land and the living, or take a hands-on approach in melee. Using two-handed swords may pack a punch but it will leave you vulnerable to attacks. Equipping a one-handed sword and shield will make up for this vulnerability but will impair your ability to deal damage.

Create a unique character in an ever-changing world, personalising both your hero and your land with 1500 different craftable and upgradable items, blocks and equipment to choose from. Face a wide variety of mobs and bosses or overwhelm other players in battle royale arenas. The world is yours to explore.

Join to out community, together we are strong!
Our community discord server:
https://discord.gg/gQvwDtW

data.short_description: 3D blocky MMORPG open-world game. Build castles with friends,discover new biomes,new monsters and resources.Craft Items and upgrade equipment. Find new cities
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
